doc:
Mark Rolston https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Rolston 0 Mark Rolston (born December 7, 1956) is an American character actor, known for his supporting roles in prolific films such as Aliens, Lethal Weapon 2, The Shawshank Redemption, The Departed and the Saw film series. Mark_Rolston ( born December_7_,_1956 ) is an_American_character_actor , known for his_supporting_roles in prolific_films such_as Aliens , Lethal_Weapon_2 , The_Shawshank_Redemption , The_Departed and the_Saw_film_series .
